titles.title: Be Still, For The Presence Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be still, for the power of the Lord is moving in this place: He comes to cleanse and heal, to minister His grace No work too hard for Him, in faith receive from Him. Be still, for the power of the Lord is moving in this place.{/lang-eng}
